casebody.data:
Teressa B. ROUSE
v.
FORSYTH COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES No. 1PA19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth County Department of Social Services. Benjamin P. Winikoff, Attorney at Law, for Rouse, Teressa B. Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of January 2019 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
